mapper.sql: id, survey_id AS surveyId, line_material AS lineMaterial, line_caliber AS lineCaliber,line_location AS lineLocation
mapper.select: select wsn.*,p.id projectId,s.create_time createTime,u.user_name surveyUserName from water_supply_network wsn left join survey s on wsn.survey_id = s.id left join project p on s.project_id = p.id left join `user` u on u.id = s.survey_user_id where p.id = #{projectId} and s.del_flag = '0' and p.del_flag = '0'
